commit.message:
print-tree.c (print_node, [...]): Print DECL_ARG_TYPE and DECL_ARG_TYPE_AS_WRITTEN.

	* print-tree.c (print_node, case PARM_DECL):
	Print DECL_ARG_TYPE and DECL_ARG_TYPE_AS_WRITTEN.
